title: Tic Tac Toe - Triqui
description: A simple yet entertaining game allows users either to play single mode game or to create a game, play with friends, and view the results after each match.

title: Excuse Me
description: It's your ultimate companion for crafting clever excuses on the go. Whether you're running late, need to dodge an awkward conversation, or simply want to add humor to your interactions.

title: Festivos Colombia 2024
description: Application where you will find all the holidays in Colombia, including basic information on each of the holidays.

title: World Holidays
description: Application where you will be able to find out all holidays over 110 countries.

title: Boyacá Dev
description: First software development conference in Boyacá, Colombia.
